entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:52 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
